biotools.summary:
A low-cost, automated DNA assembly platform for synthetic biology.

Material for DNA assembly using BASIC on OpenTrons (DNA-BOT).

Users looking to implement the DNA-BOT workflow are encouraged to consult the instructions. If you are looking to contribute to this project, please raise an issue or pull request. Otherwise, feel free to reach out to hainesm6

bioschemas.name: DNA-BOT
